source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_HARVEST_RECONCILIATION_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Harvest_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as string,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Predicted_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_Stumpage as string,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as string,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as string,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as string,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Actual_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as string,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as string,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as string,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as string,
		Predicted_SE_Other as string,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as string,
		Actual_SE_Cartage as string,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as string,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as string,
		Actual_SE_Other as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOperationType
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Group as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Product_Code as string,
		Product as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOpsProduct
ValidatedDateAndNumbersAndID@ValidDateOrNumbersOrID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidOperationType@ValidOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
CreateDerivedData split(not(isNull(Derived_Harvest_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndNumbersAndID@(ValidDateOrNumbersOrID, InvalidDateOrNumbersOrID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Harvest_ID = toInteger(Harvest_ID),
		Derived_Harvest_Unit = toInteger(Harvest_Unit),
		Derived_Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = toDecimal(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Predicted_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_Revenue = toDecimal(Predicted_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_Stumpage = toDecimal(Predicted_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_Harvest_Commencement = toDate(Actual_Harvest_Commencement,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = toDate(Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_Revenue = toDecimal(Actual_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Cartage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Harvesting, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Predicted_SE_Other = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Other, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Cartage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Harvesting, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Derived_Actual_SE_Other = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Other, 19, 4, "###,###.##")) ~> CreateDerivedData

		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,

		Predicted_Revenue,

		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,

		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,

		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,

		Predicted_SE_Other,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

ValidatedDateAndNumbersAndID@InvalidDateOrNumbersOrID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Harvest ID / Dates / Numbers")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberOrIDErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumbersOrID, SelectInvalidFundAsset, ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectInvalidSepciesCode, SelectInvalidOperationType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
RelationalOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalOperationType
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(

		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,

		Harvest_Unit,

		Product_Code,

RelationalOpsProduct select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Product_Code = Product_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalOpsProduct
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalSpeciesType lookup(Species_Code == Relational_Species_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
LookupSpeciesType split(not(isNull(Relational_Species_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSpeciesCode@(ValidSpeciesCode, InvalidSpeciesCode)
IsValidSpeciesCode@InvalidSpeciesCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Species Code")) ~> InvalidSpeciesCodeErrormessage

IsValidSpeciesCode@ValidSpeciesCode, SelectRelationalOperationType lookup(Operation_Type_Code == Relation_Operation_Type_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupOperationType
LookupOperationType split(not(isNull(Relation_Operation_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidOperationType@(ValidOperationType, InvalidOperationType)

		Harvest_ID as string,

	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,

		Harvest_Unit,

		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,

	)) ~> StagingDB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Harvest_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as string,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Predicted_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_Stumpage as string,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as string,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as string,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as string,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Actual_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as string,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as string,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as string,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as string,
		Predicted_SE_Other as string,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as string,
		Actual_SE_Cartage as string,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as string,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as string,
		Actual_SE_Other as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Harvest_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as date,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as date,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalHarvestReconciliation
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalHarvestReconciliation derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Harvest_Unit,Operation_Type_Code,Product_Code,Species_Code,Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,Predicted_Harvested_GMT,Predicted_Revenue,Predicted_Stumpage,Actual_Harvest_Commencement,Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,Actual_Harvested_GMT,Actual_Revenue,Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,Predicted_SE_Cartage,Predicted_SE_Harvesting,Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Predicted_SE_Other,Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,Actual_SE_Cartage,Actual_SE_Harvesting,Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Actual_SE_Other)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Harvest_ID = Harvest_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Harvest_Unit = Harvest_Unit,
		Relation_Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code,
		Relation_Product_Code = Product_Code,
		Relation_Species_Code = Species_Code,
		Relation_Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Relation_Predicted_Harvested_GMT = Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Relation_Predicted_Revenue = Predicted_Revenue,
		Relation_Predicted_Stumpage = Predicted_Stumpage,
		Relation_Actual_Harvest_Commencement = Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Relation_Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Relation_Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Relation_Actual_Harvested_GMT = Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Relation_Actual_Revenue = Actual_Revenue,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Cartage = Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Harvesting = Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Other = Predicted_SE_Other,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Cartage = Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Harvesting = Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Other = Actual_SE_Other,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndNumbersAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Harvest_Unit,Operation_Type_Code,Product_Code,Species_Code,Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,Predicted_Harvested_GMT,Predicted_Revenue,Predicted_Stumpage,Actual_Harvest_Commencement,Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,Actual_Harvested_GMT,Actual_Revenue,Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,Predicted_SE_Cartage,Predicted_SE_Harvesting,Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Predicted_SE_Other,Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,Actual_SE_Cartage,Actual_SE_Harvesting,Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Actual_SE_Other)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Harvest_ID == Relation_Harvest_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingRecord@NewRecord select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Harvest_ID = toInteger(Harvest_ID),
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = toDecimal(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Predicted_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_Revenue = toDecimal(Predicted_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_Stumpage = toDecimal(Predicted_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement = toDate(Actual_Harvest_Commencement, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = toDate(Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_Revenue = toDecimal(Actual_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Cartage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Harvesting, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Other = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Other, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Cartage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Harvesting, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Other = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Other, 19, 4, "###,###.##")) ~> ConvertDatesAndNumbersAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum || 
Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit != Relation_Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit || 
Predicted_Harvested_GMT != Relation_Predicted_Harvested_GMT || 
Predicted_Revenue != Relation_Predicted_Revenue || 
Predicted_Stumpage != Relation_Predicted_Stumpage || 
Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area != Relation_Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area || 
Actual_Harvested_GMT != Relation_Actual_Harvested_GMT || 
Actual_Revenue != Relation_Actual_Revenue || 
Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys != Relation_Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys || 
Predicted_SE_Cartage != Relation_Predicted_SE_Cartage || 
Predicted_SE_Harvesting != Relation_Predicted_SE_Harvesting || 
Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence != Relation_Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence || 
Predicted_SE_Other != Relation_Predicted_SE_Other || 
Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys != Relation_Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys || 
Actual_SE_Cartage != Relation_Actual_SE_Cartage || 
Actual_SE_Harvesting != Relation_Actual_SE_Harvesting || 
Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence != Relation_Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence || 
Actual_SE_Other != Relation_Actual_SE_Other,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingRecord@(NewRecord, ChangedRecord, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingRecord@ChangedRecord derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID = Relation_Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Harvest_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as date,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as date,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Harvest_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
